title: What are some examples of logically equivalent statements? - Quora

response.answer_text: If statements can be proven by each other. A Dog is an animal. A pet is an animal you own. So Owning a Dog would be owning a pet therefore: If Chris owns a dog then he owns a pet. If Chris doesn't own a pet then he doesn't own a dog. (A <-> B) is the same as ((Not B) <-> (Not A))
